param.name: activity_layout
param.label: Layout
param.description: Select the layout for this stream. Button layout displays a button that displays the stream after clicking.

param.name: activity_direction
param.label: Direction
param.description: Select what direction posts should load. If up then newest posts will be displayed at the bottom. If down then newest posts will be displayed at the top.

param.name: activity_auto_update
param.label: Auto Update
param.description: Enable or disable automatically updating the stream with newest entries. Note this is done at set intervals and will prepend new entries at the beginning of the stream based off the timestamp of the most recent entry.

param.name: activity_auto_load
param.label: Auto Load
param.description: Enable or disable automatically loading in the next page. Note this is done at set intervals and will only load in the next page if the more button is visible during its check.

param.name: activity_pinned
param.label: Pinned
param.description: Enable or disable display of pinned posts. When enabled pinned posts will always display at the top of the stream. When disabled pinned posts will display normally as if it was never pinned.

param.name: activity_create
param.label: Create
param.description: Enable or disable creation of new posts.

param.name: activity_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select post create access. Access determines who can post a new message. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

param.name: activity_create_connected
param.label: Create Connected Access
param.description: Enable or disable connected create access. This checks if the viewing user is connected to the post owner or stream owner. This is in addition to Create Access. If disabled only Create Access will be used to determine posting permission.

param.name: activity_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input maximum number of characters a message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: activity_collapsed
param.label: Collapsed
param.description: Enable or disable collapsing of new post textarea and its buttons.

param.name: activity_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: activity_paging_first_limit
param.label: Page First Limit
param.description: Input first page limit. First Page limit determines how many rows are displayed on the first page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.name: activity_paging_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.description: Input maximum number of characters a action message can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: comments_replies_actions_include
param.label: Include
param.description: Optionally specify what actions are included for selection. Note actions already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: comments_replies_actions_exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.description: Optionally exclude actions from being selected. Note actions already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: comments_replies_locations
param.label: Locations
param.description: Enable or disable usage of locations. Locations help clarify where a post was physically made.

param.name: comments_replies_locations_address_limit
param.label: Address Limit
param.description: Input maximum number of characters a location address can have. If 0 allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: comments_replies_locations_include
param.label: Include
param.description: Optionally specify what locations to include for selection. Note locations already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: comments_replies_locations_exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.description: Optionally exclude locations from being selected. Note locations already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: comments_replies_links
param.label: Links
param.description: Enable or disable usage of links. Links make it easy to attach images, photos, videos, music, and even websites to a post.

param.name: comments_replies_links_embedded
param.label: Embedded Links
param.description: Enable or disable parsing of embedded URLs to links. Embedded URLs are URLs supplied directly in a message.

param.name: comments_replies_links_link_limit
param.label: Link Limit
param.description: Input maximum number of links a post can have. Set to 0 for unlimited links. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: comments_replies_links_file_extensions
param.label: Link File Extensions
param.description: Input a comma separated list of file extensions to be parsed as file links. File links attempt to parse out relevant download information like modify date, file size, and extension.

param.name: comments_replies_tags
param.label: Tags
param.description: Enable or disable usage of tags. Tags help determine who the user is with at time of posting.

param.name: comments_replies_likes
param.label: Likes
param.description: Enable or disable usage of likes.

param.name: comments_replies_likes_include
param.label: Include
param.description: Optionally specify what types to include for selection. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: comments_replies_likes_exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.description: Optionally exclude types from being selected. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: following_layout
param.label: Layout
param.description: Select the layout for the follow button. Button layout displays a button style. Simple displays simple text link. Extended displays a simple text link, but extends the count to include the first 2 following users names.

param.name: following_count
param.label: Count
param.description: Enable or disable the display of the follower count. Clicking the follower count will display a list of users following the asset.

param.name: following_connected
param.label: Connected
param.description: Enable or disable connected check. This checks if the viewing user is connected to the asset (e.g. in cases of profile.USER_ID) or stream owner. This is in addition to registered user access check. If disabled only registered user access check will be used to determine following permission. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: likes_layout
param.label: Layout
param.description: Select the layout for the like button. Button layout displays a button style. Simple displays simple text link. Extended displays a simple text link, but extends the count to include the first 2 likes users names.

param.name: likes_count
param.label: Count
param.description: Enable or disable the display of the likes count. Clicking the likes count will display a list of users who liked the asset.

param.name: likes_include
param.label: Include
param.description: Optionally specify what types to include for selection. Note types already selected will be unaffected.

param.name: likes_exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.description: Optionally exclude types from being selected. Note types already selected will be unaffected.
